summary: The beauty of the land cannot mask the brutality of a farm town. As harvest draws near, Betty confronts a terrifying new reality and will go to desperate lengths to save her family when they are threatened with being forced from their land.
cast: Joanne Kelly|Neal Huff|Alex Shaffer|Kivlighan de Montebello|Darlene Hunt|Rashel Bestard|Tom Bower|Brennan James Callan|Drew Cash|Thomas Dunbar|Jennifer Graham|Brad Koed|Joseph Melendez|Mark Sawyer-Dailey|Michael Taft|Rich Williams|Shane Woodson
title: Runoff
